title: Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser to Present at Bernstein's 37th Annual Strategic Decisions Conference
summary: New York - Jane Fraser, Chief Executive Officer of Citigroup, will present at Bernstein's 37th Annual Strategic Decisions Conference held virtually on Friday, June 4, 2021. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 10 a.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-1: Citigroup CEO Jane Fraser to Present at Bernstein's 37th Annual Strategic Decisions Conference

tag-3: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
